law.catch_line: Suspension Or Revocation Of Registration; Hearing

text.section: the failure of said vehicle to meet equipment standards after the owner has received notice to comply with the standards;

operation of such vehicle improperly or in such a manner as to cause damage to any property or death or injury to any person, or that the registrant has allowed or permitted such vehicle to be so operated.
